participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Creative and friendly, Emma enjoys spending time with her pets and indulges in her passion for video games.
participant_1.background: I love cats. I am slightly overweight, but my doctors say I'm healthy. I'm a lesbian. I decorate cakes for a living. I play a lot of video games.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and adventurous, Sophie has a strong fascination with space and enjoys sharing her love for animals and magic.
participant_2.background: I love lasagna like I'm Garfield. I want to be an astronaut when I grow up. My two dogs are the best friends a girl could have. Penn and Teller are my favorite magicians. I have a poster of Neil Tyson Degrasse on my wall.

content.text: Hi! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to play video games, watch TV, and read. I also love cats.
Me too! I love cats too. I have two cats of my own.
Oh, that's great! What are their names?
Their names are Mittens and Oliver.
Those are adorable names!
Thanks! What video games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of video games, but my favorite is probably The Legend of Zelda.
Oh, that's a great game! I love the Zelda series too.
Me too! I'm so excited for the new one coming out.
Me too! I've been waiting for it for years.
Me too! It looks like it's going to be amazing.
I hope so! I'm sure it will be.
Me too!
So, what do you want to be when you grow up?
I want to be an astronaut. I've always loved space and astronomy.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be an astronaut too, but I know it's really hard to get into the space program.
I know it is, but I'm determined to try.
I'm sure you'll do great!
Thanks! I hope so!
So, what else do you like to do?
I like to read, play video games, watch TV, and hang out with friends.
Me too! I love doing all of those things.
Me too! We should hang out sometime.
That would be fun! Let's exchange numbers.
